A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The story doesn't make alot of sense. Whats wrong with having everything connected? Ostensibly you are trying to break the cycle and go out in to new territory. Having Skywalker hanging out on a planet in hiding a la Yoda isn't new. If skywalker is apathetic then do that. But this feels like in a rush to go to the next generation. Less than satsified.
